title: Did Rush Limbaugh Avoid the Draft Due to an Anal Cyst?
subtitle: "Anyone who has listened to Limbaugh's program can imagine the dripping scorn he would bring to the revelation that a prominent Democrat had skipped a war over something like that."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Talk radio host Rush Limbaugh was disqualified from the Vietnam-era draft due to a pilonidal cyst.
